mapper.sql: id, sender_id, receiver_id, content, is_read, send_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (sender_id, receiver_id, content, is_read, send_time) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content}, #{isRead}, #{sendTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM messages WHERE (sender_id = #{senderId} AND receiver_id = #{receiverId}) OR (sender_id = #{receiverId} AND receiver_id = #{senderId}) ORDER BY send_time ASC
